--- title: basicInfo keywords: fastai sidebar: home_sidebar summary: "Parse basic info from an SEC filing's index page." description: "Parse basic info from an SEC filing's index page." nb_path: "05_basicInfo.ipynb" ---
{% raw %}
{% endraw %} {% raw %}
{% endraw %}

Parse basic info from a filing's index page HTML using BeautifulSoup:

{% raw %}

getSecFormLinkList[source]

getSecFormLinkList(indexSoup, accessNo)

Returns sublinkList, completeTextLink where sublinkList is: [(name, description, type, sublink), ... ] Prints a warning message if the complete text link is missing.

{% endraw %} {% raw %}

getSecFormCiks[source]

getSecFormCiks(indexSoup, accessNo)

Returns full list of CIKs on the filing, the "filed by" cik if present, and the list of CIK types (Issuer, Filed by, etc): [cik, ... ], filingCik, [cikType, ... ]

{% endraw %} {% raw %}

getTextAfterTag[source]

getTextAfterTag(resDict, resKey, top, firstTagPat, firstTagName='div', firstTagClass='infoHead', nextTagName='div', nextTagClass='info', missingMessage=None, strListHeader=None)

Looks for a sequence of two HTML elements specified by name and class, with the text of the first element matching a given regular expression. If found, stores the text of the second element in resDict[resKey]. If not found and missingMessage is not None, prints it.

{% endraw %} {% raw %}

get99Texts[source]

get99Texts(info, textLimit=1000)

{% endraw %} {% raw %}

getSecFormInfo[source]

getSecFormInfo(accessNo, formType=None, get99=False, textLimit=1000)

Parses some basic information from the index URL of a form with the given accession number. Returns a dict { 'links' : [(name, description, type, sublink), ... ], 'complete' : completeTextLink, 'ciks' : [cik, ... ], } For some forms, additional fields may be parsed: 'period' : 'YYYY-MM-DD', 'acceptDate' : 'YYYY-MM-DD', 'acceptTime' : 'HH:MM:SS', 'items' : [title, ... ], 'filedByCik' : cik,

{% endraw %} {% raw %}
{% endraw %}

Test parsing basic info:

{% raw %} 
s = getSecFormInfo('0001140361-18-003143','4')
assert s == {
    'links': [('doc1.html','FORM 4','4',
               '/Archives/edgar/data/83350/000114036118003143/xslF345X03/doc1.xml'),
              ('doc1.xml','FORM 4','4',
               '/Archives/edgar/data/83350/000114036118003143/doc1.xml')],
    'complete': '/Archives/edgar/data/83350/000114036118003143/0001140361-18-003143.txt',
    'ciks': ['0000083350', '0001436951'],
    'cikTypes': ['Issuer', 'Reporting'],
    'period': '2010-03-04',
    'acceptDate': '2018-01-25',
    'acceptTime': '11:20:33'}, "parsing form 4 basic info"

s = getSecFormInfo('0001086763-21-000007','SC 13G')
assert s == {
    'links': [('ffa13g03312021vidler.htm','FIRST FOUNDATION ADVISORS_VIDLER','SC 13G',
               '/Archives/edgar/data/830122/000108676321000007/ffa13g03312021vidler.htm')],
    'complete': '/Archives/edgar/data/830122/000108676321000007/0001086763-21-000007.txt',
    'ciks': ['0000830122', '0001086763'],
    'cikTypes': ['Subject', 'Filed by'],
    'filedByCik': '0001086763',
    'acceptDate': '2021-05-17',
    'acceptTime': '19:32:43'}, "parsing form 13G basic info"

s = getSecFormInfo('0001193125-21-190221','8-K')
assert s['items']==['Item 5.03: Amendments to Articles of Incorporation or Bylaws; Change in Fiscal Year',
 'Item 8.01: Other Events',
 'Item 9.01: Financial Statements and Exhibits'], "parsing form 8-K items"

s = getSecFormInfo('0001753926-21-000263','8-K', get99=True, textLimit=1000)
assert (s['text99'][1].startswith('EcoChain, Inc. Reports Monthly Site Level Financials for Q2 2021 Revenue')
        and s['text99'][1].endswith('Summary Results (thousands) Q1 2021 Q2 2021 Change % Change')
       ), "parsing form 8-K EX-99 text"
{% endraw %}
